channel.title: Lure Fishing spot not working correct
channel.description: my bait / lure fishing spots not working right, when i go to fish with rod for bait fishing it makes me use fly fishing rod and fishing bait instead of fishing rod and fishing bait , and for the fly fishing it don't work at all.. where and what class do i look at for this? i don't want a copy and paste just wanna learn and need to know what class its in.

item.title: Lure Fishing spot not working correct
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Fishing.java -> Deals with the logic after clicking

as for the clicking on the npc… I’m not sure exactly which class but inside the packets package look for any method that handles clicking
ClickingStuff
ClickNPC1
ClickNPC2
or something alike

Read full topic
item.source: Lure Fishing spot not working correct
